current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To improve the safety of dietary supplements by amending
		  the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require manufacturers of dietary
		  supplements to register dietary supplements with the Food and Drug
		  Administration and to amend labeling requirements with respect to dietary
		  supplements.

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Health, Education, Labor,
			 and Pensions

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act/s:415/ss:a

text.#text:
A facility engaged in manufacturing or processing dietary
				supplements that is required to register under this section shall comply with
				the requirements of this paragraph, in addition to the other requirements of
				this section.

a description of
				each dietary supplement manufactured or processed by such facility;

a list of all
				ingredients in each such dietary supplement; and

a copy of the
				label for each such dietary supplement.
